"Google insisted the story wasn't accurate, wasn't even close to accurate, and generally contained no accuracy whatsoever," Michael Arrington wrote. We killed the story, since their denials seemed fairly straightforward and honest, and we found no other independent sources. Bernie Sanders said, It is my strong hope that Vermont will lead the nation in a new direction through a Medicare-for-all single-payer approach. At a time when 50 million Americans lack health insurance and when the cost of health care continues to soar, we must do all we can to lower the costs and improve the quality of care.
